author: Staff Reporter
text:
Special pujas performed

Thousands of devotees thronged Siva temples in the district in course of ‘Sivalaya ottam’, covering 12 temples, on Maha Sivarathri day on Monday.

Special pujas were performed at all the temples, including Guganatheeswarar Temple and Kasi Viswanathar Temple in Kanyakumari.

Special Pujas were also performed at Tirumalai Mahadevar Temple in Munchirai and 12 temples located at Tirumalai, Tikkurichi, Tirpparappu, Tirunandikkarai, Ponmanai, Pannipakam, Kalkulam, Melangodu, Tiruvidaikkodu, Tiruvithancodu, Tirupannikodu and Tirunattalam.
title: Special pujas performed in Siva temples
